thread.title: Arsenal top Premier League table with 2-1 win over Everton
thread.title_full: Arsenal top Premier League table with 2-1 win over Everton | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Arsenal top Premier League table with 2-1 win over Everton
text:
Other Articles Cristiano Ronaldo sets the tone as Real Madrid top La Liga table Giroud, Koscielny head Arsenal to win over porous Everton Real Madrid's Benitez hopeful on Modric fitness for Celta clash Arsenal continued to display their new-found groove as they climbed to the top of the Premier League after defeating Everton 2-1 at the Emirates Stadium.
Oliver Giroud skillfully converted Mesut Ozil’s cross to put Arsenal ahead in the 36th minute before Laurent Koscielny doubled the lead two minutes later.
Although Everton pulled one back through Ross Barkley’s deflected shot, Arsenal proved too strong for the tourists eventually.
Piling more misery on Everton, Gareth Barry was given an injury-time dismissal as he picked up a second yellow card for a foul on Kieran Gibbs.
Arsene Wenger’s side, however, would lose their numero uno position if Manchester City get a draw or more at Manchester United on Sunday.
 25, 2015 11:01 am
